org.campbelll.life

Interface Life

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sequential

    public interface Life
    Interface for Conway's Game of Life implementations in org.campbelll.life.

    Rules for Conway's Game of life can be found here.

    Author:
    Campbell Lockley

    • Method Detail

      • age

        void age()
        Calculates the next generation in the game of life.

      • loadPattern

        void loadPattern(java.io.InputStream in)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 FileFormatException
        Loads a starting pattern for the game of life from an input stream.

        First line of input stream must have: "[x] [y]"

        • x - x position in board where pattern starts
        • y - y position in board where pattern starts

        Following that is any number of lines representing the pattern. Space denotes "dead" cells, and any character which is not a space denotes a "live" cell.

        Parameters:
        in - Input stream to load starting state from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        FileFormatException

      • printBoard

        void printBoard(int width,
                int height)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Prints part of the current state of the board to stdout.

        printBoard(40, 40) will print the top left 40x40 section of the board.

        Parameters:
        x - Width to print.
        y - Height to print.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
